attributes.action: Give ALL public sector workers an equal payrise
attributes.additional_details: We are petitioning for this to be extended to ALL public sector workers including doctors, nurses and social care due to their relentless hard work on a daily basis.
attributes.background:
It has been announced today, that some public sector workers will receive a pay increase following their hard work during Covid 19. 
This is devastating news to many not included who continually feel disregarded by government. 
ALL public sector workers deserve pay increases.
